actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Commissioner of Education to make grants to Fisk University, Nashville, Tennessee, for the William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs.
short_title: William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs Assistance Act

summary.text: William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs Assistance Act - Authorizes the Commissioner of Education to make grants to Fisk University, in Nashville, Tennessee, for the development of the William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs of Fisk University.

titles.title: William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs Assistance Act
A bill to authorize the Commissioner of Education to make grants to Fisk University, Nashville, Tennessee, for the William Levi Dawson Institute of Public Affairs.
